chefRecipes.name: Biryani
chefRecipes.cooking_method: 1. Fry onions in oil until golden brown, remove from pan. 2. Fry meat in the same pan until brown, remove from pan. 3. Fry potatoes in the same pan until golden brown, remove from pan. 4. Mix rice, meat, potatoes, fried onions, and spices in a pot. 5. Cook until rice is fully cooked, serve hot with yogurt.

chefRecipes.name: Chingri Malai Curry
chefRecipes.cooking_method: 1. Fry onions and garlic in oil until golden brown. 2. Add prawns and spices to the pan,(add all necessary spices should be added  to enhance the taste fo the food,) cook for a few minutes. 3. Add coconut milk to the pan, simmer until prawns are fully cooked. 4. Serve hot with rice.

chefRecipes.name: Morog Polao
chefRecipes.cooking_method: 1. Marinate chicken with yogurt and spices for a few hours. 2. Fry onions in oil until golden brown, remove from pan. 3. Fry chicken in the same pan until brown, remove from pan. 4. Mix rice, fried onions, chicken, and spices in a pot. 5. Cook until rice is fully cooked, serve hot.

shortBio: Award-winning chef with 10 years of experience creating unique and delicious recipes.
